About Our Company

We are the cold chain solutions leaders
For the South East region

RONEY LLC's Cold chain solution provides exceptional service, quality control, and top-of-the-line logistical support throughout the United States. We service the South and North East region. Working with mega carriers like J.B Hunt and Prime Inc. We have extensive first-hand knowledge and experience with operating in this region while providing accurate on time delivery with the ability to troubleshoot most in-cab ELD/Qualcomm hardware and software systems. Our continuous studies of modern technology for the commercial freight industry help my team offer our clients no lost, no stolen, and no damage freight claims. We are also trained to troubleshoot Carrier and Thermo King cooling units, which allows me to save money on maintenance and downtime which allows me to offer competitive prices to my clients.
  • Expetional Service
  • Quality Control
  • Premium Logistical Support
